statusLine.command: input=$(cat); used=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.used_percentage // empty'); remaining=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.remaining_percentage // empty'); [ -n "$used" ] && printf "\033[33m%s\033[0m" "[$used%已用]"; [ -n "$remaining" ] && printf " \033[32m%s\033[0m" "$remaining%剩余"
